info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 02 at 4:10PM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Prowers and northeastern Baca Counties through 445 PM MDT... At 410 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 9 miles east of Two Buttes, or 13 miles northwest of The Saunders Elevator, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of southeastern Prowers and northeastern Baca Counties. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
